name: Orbital Response
description: Established in 1972, Orbital Response has been a subsidiary of Menzies Distribution (part of John Menzies PLC) since 2012.As part of Menzies Distribution, Orbital Response offer integrated and stand-alone fulfilment and call centre services to a wide range of UK and international organisations.Our continuing aim is to develop client relationships by giving a professional and reliable service, creating innovative solutions and providing value for money.
